text: J.D. Tippit was a police officer in Dallas, Texas, murdered on the 22nd of November, 1963, by Lee Harvey Oswald. This was the same day that John F. Kennedy was assassinated. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1963 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Deaths by firearm in Texas Category:People murdered in the United States
title: J. D. Tippit
